LanguageData.MakeSteelBars_Hand.label: 熔炼 钢铁
LanguageData.MakeSteelBars_Hand.description: Smelts steel alloy from iron ore and coal or charcoal. Produces 20.
LanguageData.MakeSteelBars_Electric.label: 熔炼 钢铁
LanguageData.MakeSteelBars_Electric.description: Smelts steel alloy from iron ore and coal or charcoal. Produces 20.
LanguageData.MakeBronze_Hand.label: 熔炼 青铜
LanguageData.MakeBronze_Hand.description: Smelts bronze alloy from copper ore and other metals. Produces 30.
LanguageData.MakeBronze_Electric.label: 熔炼 青铜
LanguageData.MakeBronze_Electric.description: Smelts bronze alloy from copper ore and other metals. Produces 30.
LanguageData.ProcessNickelOre.label: 熔炼 镍合金
LanguageData.ProcessNickelOre.description: Smelts nickel alloy from nickel ore. Produces 15.
LanguageData.ProcessCobalt.label: 熔炼 钴合金
LanguageData.ProcessCobalt.description: Smelts cobalt alloy from nickel ore. Produces 15.
LanguageData.ProcessForManganese.label: 熔炼 锰合金
LanguageData.ProcessForManganese.description: Smelts pyrolusite ore into manganese alloy. Produces 10.
LanguageData.ProcessForChromium.label: 熔炼 铬合金
LanguageData.ProcessForChromium.description: Smelts chromium alloy from iron ore. Chromium is a vital ingredient used in the production of nichrome. Produces 10.
LanguageData.ProcessTungsten.label: 熔炼 钨合金
LanguageData.ProcessTungsten.description: Smelts wolframite ore into tungsten alloy. Produces 15.
LanguageData.ProcessTitanium.label: 熔炼 钛合金
LanguageData.ProcessTitanium.description: Smelts ilmenite ore into titanium alloy. Produces 15.
LanguageData.MakeCupronickelAlloy.label: 熔炼 梅尔基奥合金
LanguageData.MakeCupronickelAlloy.description: Smelts melchior alloy from copper, nickel and aluminum. Melchior has a high electrical resistance. Produces 30.
LanguageData.MakeCupronickelAlloy.jobString: 熔炼 梅尔基奥合金
LanguageData.MakeFerrosiliconAlloy.label: 熔炼 山达斯特合金
LanguageData.MakeFerrosiliconAlloy.description: Smelts sendust alloy by reducing silicon in the presence of iron and aluminium. Sendust is a tougher metal than steel. Produces 30.
LanguageData.MakeFerrosiliconAlloy.jobString: 熔炼 山达斯特合金
LanguageData.MakeFerronickelAlloy.label: 熔炼 斯坦合金
LanguageData.MakeFerronickelAlloy.description: Smelts stein alloy from iron, nickel and manganese. Stein is a tougher metal than sendust. Produces 20.
LanguageData.MakeStelliteAlloy.label: 熔炼 斯特莱特合金
LanguageData.MakeStelliteAlloy.description: Smelts stellite, an alloy of cobalt, chromium and tungsten. Stellite is designed for wear resistance. Produces 20.
LanguageData.MakeStelliteAlloy.jobString: 熔炼 斯特莱特合金
LanguageData.MakeNichromeAlloy.label: 熔炼 镍铬合金
LanguageData.MakeNichromeAlloy.description: Smelts nichrome, an alloy of nickel, chromium and manganese. Nichrome is typically used for resistant wiring. Produces 20.
LanguageData.MakeAlnicoAlloy.label: 熔炼 阿尔尼科合金
LanguageData.MakeAlnicoAlloy.description: Smelts alnico, an alloy of steel, nickel, aluminum and cobalt. Alnico is used in the creation of strong permanent magnets, and can be magnetised to produce strong magnetic fields. Produces 20.
LanguageData.MakeAlnicoAlloy.jobString: 熔炼 阿尔尼科合金
LanguageData.MakePobediteAlloy.label: 熔炼 培博戴特合金
LanguageData.MakePobediteAlloy.description: Smelts pobedite, an alloy of carbon fiber, tungsten and cobalt. This composite alloy possesses a particularly high hardness. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakePobediteAlloy.jobString: 熔炼 培博戴特合金
LanguageData.MakeGoldBars_Hand.label: 熔炼 金锭
LanguageData.MakeGoldBars_Hand.description: Smelts gold, a beautiful, precious alloy of gold and copper or bauxite. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakeGoldBars_Electric.label: 熔炼 金锭
LanguageData.MakeGoldBars_Electric.description: Smelts gold, a beautiful, precious alloy of gold and copper or bauxite. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakeSilverBars_Hand.label: 熔炼 纯银锭
LanguageData.MakeSilverBars_Hand.description: Smelts sterling silver, a valuable alloy of silver and either copper or bauxite. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakeSilverBars_Electric.label: 熔炼 纯银锭
LanguageData.MakeSilverBars_Electric.description: Smelts sterling silver, a valuable alloy of silver and either copper or bauxite. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakeCopperBars_Hand.label: 熔炼 铜锭
LanguageData.MakeCopperBars_Hand.description: Smelts copper alloy from copper ore. Produces 15.
LanguageData.MakeCopperBars_Electric.label: 熔炼 铜锭
LanguageData.MakeCopperBars_Electric.description: Smelts copper alloy from copper ore. Produces 15.
LanguageData.MakeTinBars_Hand.label: 熔炼 锡锭
LanguageData.MakeTinBars_Hand.description: Smelts tin alloy from tin ore. Tin can be used to construct workbenches with higher than average working speed. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakeTinBars_Electric.label: 熔炼 锡锭
LanguageData.MakeTinBars_Electric.description: Smelts tin alloy from tin ore. Tin can be used to construct workbenches with higher than average working speed. Produces 20.
LanguageData.MakeAluminiumBars_Hand.label: 熔炼 铝合金
LanguageData.MakeAluminiumBars_Hand.description: Smelts aluminium alloy from bauxite ore. Produces 15.
LanguageData.MakeAluminiumBars_Electric.label: 熔炼 铝合金
LanguageData.MakeAluminiumBars_Electric.description: Smelts aluminium alloy from bauxite ore. Produces 15.
LanguageData.MakeFerrotitaniumAlloy.label: 熔炼 钛铁合金
LanguageData.MakeFerrotitaniumAlloy.description: Smelts ferrotitanium, a very durable alloy made from steel, titanium and carbon fiber. Produces 15.
LanguageData.MakeNitinolAlloy.label: 熔炼 镍钛合金
LanguageData.MakeNitinolAlloy.description: Smelts nitinol, an alloy of nickel and titanium. It is exceptionally durable, somewhat beautiful and difficult to make. Produces 15.
LanguageData.MakeCarbonAlloy.label: 熔炼 碳纤维
LanguageData.MakeCarbonAlloy.description: Smelts carbon fiber alloy, a polymer composite material of interwoven strands of carbon fibers arranged in a matrix of polymer resins. Produces 10.
